metadata.title: HAKU - Your Strategic Partner
metadata.description: We are your digital marketing ally, inspired by the Kaizen philosophy. We offer creative and effective solutions that drive the continuous growth of your business. Discover how we can take your brand to the next level!

plans.title: Sakura Plan
plans.description: Ideal for those taking their first steps in the digital world

plans.inspiration: Inspired by the great samurai leaders
plans.title: Bushido Plan
plans.description: Perfect for those seeking solid market leadership

items.title: Personal Branding
items.description: Logo and visual design for your brand.

items.title: Platforms
items.description: Instagram, Facebook.

items.title: Content
items.description: 4-6 featured posts, 6 stories, 4 posts, and 1 carousel per month.

items.title: Lead Strategy
items.description: Social media campaign and lead generation for followers who view content but aren't clients yet. Includes automated sales funnels applying urgency and social proof techniques.

items.title: Ads
items.description: Multi-channel ads to close sales.

items.title: Data Analysis
items.description: Biweekly reports to maximize return on investment.

plans.title: Tenka Plan
plans.description: Designed for those who want to dominate the market

items.title: Personal Branding
items.description: Logo and visual design for your brand.

items.title: Platforms
items.description: Instagram, Facebook.

items.title: Content
items.description: 4-6 featured posts, 8 stories, 4 posts, and 2 carousels per month.

items.title: Lead Strategy
items.description: Social media campaign for followers who view content but aren't clients yet. Includes advanced automated sales funnels with urgency and scarcity techniques.

items.title: Ads
items.description: Aggressive campaigns with strong budgets and constant A/B testing.

items.title: Data Analysis
items.description: Weekly reports on all metrics, focusing on customer value and acquisition cost.

header.title: Revolutionize Your Digital Strategy
header.subtitle: Apply the Kaizen method and start standing out

slides.title: About Us
slides.text: We are a team passionate about continuous improvement, dedicated to offering digital strategies that adapt to your needs and evolve with you.

slides.title: Our Goal
slides.text: We help you achieve your goals, improving every step of your digital journey so that you grow sustainably and efficiently.

slides.title: Our Philosophy
slides.text: We apply the Kaizen method to drive constant innovation in every project, ensuring results that stand out in a competitive digital environment.

items.title: Analysis and Strategy
items.text: We will perform a thorough analysis of the market, competitors, and audience to design a personalized digital strategy that drives your brand and meets your goals.

items.title: Presentation of Drafts
items.text: We will develop prototypes and sketches of campaigns and content so you can visualize the creative approach and ensure it aligns with your vision and objectives before moving forward.

items.title: Content Creation and Execution
items.text: We will create high-impact visual, written, and multimedia content, launching advertising campaigns on key platforms like Google, Facebook, and more, ensuring that every action maximizes your presence and connects with your audience.

items.title: Results Analysis
items.text: We will monitor the performance of campaigns and provide detailed reports to assess the impact, making adjustments to maximize return on investment.
